title: Ministry of Health, Population and Hospital Reform - Wikipedia
snippet: Former ministers include: fr:Abderrahmane Benbouzid (January 4, 2020–September 8, 2022) ... In 2020, there were according to the Ministry 586 public health establishments in Algeria. There are 69,948 beds in CHU, EHU, EH, EHS, and EPH establishments and 6,584 beds in community hospitals (EPSP).

title: Ministry of Health, Population and Hospital Reform (Algeria) | GHDx
snippet: Formerly named the Ministry of Health and Population (Ministère de la Santé et de la Population).

title: Ministry of Health and Family Welfare - Wikipedia
snippet: The current minister is Jagat Prakash Nadda, while the current Minister of State for health (MOS: assistant to Minister i.e. currently assistant to J. P. Nadda) are Anupriya Patel and Prataprao Ganpatrao Jadhav.

title: Ministry of Health and Population (Nepal) - Wikipedia
snippet: These include four regional hospitals, 11 zonal hospitals, five teaching hospitals, as well as district hospitals and general hospitals. Bikas Devkota currently holds the position of Secretary of the Ministry of Health and Population. Roshan ...
